[Download for Mac](http://links.screenhero.) 

[Download for Windows](http://links.screenhero.) 

You'll use Screenhero to pair program on the Algorithms and Front End Project challenges.

Here are other alternatives to Screenhero as suggested by our fellow campers:

* TeamViewer (also works for Linux)	
* Skype + ScreenLeap
* Codeshare.io
* Kobra.io
* Google Hangouts
* jsbin
* Cloud 9
* Appear.in
* [tmate](http://tmate.io) + some communication tool, e.g, Google Hangouts, Skype, [appear.in](http://appear.in)
